title: Red Onion
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Western, Beer/Wine, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Chef-owned fusion food restaurant. Offers a separate vegan menu with dishes such as tomato basil soup, avocado salad with spicy peanut dressing and crispy noodles, tempura vegetables with sweet chilli and soy dip, grilled mushroom bruschetta with onion marmalade.
